terms.content5: You pledge not to write data or messages that imply belittling others in any way. If you find the applicant unsuitable, you can ignore the message without offense.
terms.content6: The site charges a fee from any member who marries through the site. This is a binding agreement. The fee is 1000 SAR.
terms.content7: You pledge not to register more than one account for yourself on the site.
terms.content8: It is strictly forbidden to include any contact information in the registration request (email, phone number, mobile number, P.O. box, or any means leading to communication outside the site).

terms.content11: The site is not responsible for any content or violations by users. The site may delete or disable any account or content, temporarily or permanently, if it violates the terms or for any reason deemed necessary, without user consent. The site may correct incorrect information entered by users or modify violating content with or without user request. The site does not guarantee any content, operation, user compatibility, or marriage.
terms.content12: Site management may suspend any account if seriousness cannot be confirmed. No paid amounts will be refunded.
terms.content13: The site cares deeply about user privacy. No human has access to private conversations. Despite efforts to ensure privacy and security, the site cannot guarantee against misuse of login information, device sharing, technical errors, or hacking. The site may use email, calls, SMS, or WhatsApp as primary means of communication or advertising.
terms.content14: The site reserves the right to modify these terms at any time without user consent, by updating this page. Continued use after updates constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
